DataElement.preferredName: Bristol Stool Scale Current Cycle Median Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the median score for the Bristol Stool Scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Bristol Stool Scale Current Therapy Cycle Median Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A medical scale designed to classify human feces into seven categories by form._The name of the therapy that is currently being administered._An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence._The value which has an equal number of values greater and less than it._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A medical scale designed to classify human feces into seven categories by form.
